entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
